ygData.msgSnippet: Tigerhawk gets hit in the shoulder it damages his shoulder laughs shrinks down the energy balls to pellets. Flicks them at Tavatorn and Iron Raptor each

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Tigerhawk gets hit in the shoulder it damages his shoulder laughs shrinks 
down the energy balls to pellets. Flicks them at Tavatorn and Iron Raptor 
each skimming past there them barely missing. "The rescue was not my 
objective" 

Tigerhawk narrows his eyes and thinks I hope they don't call my bluff. "Iron 
you forget your place this was a suicide runs if I got the girls out nice if 
I failed self detonation." Tigerhawk raises his arms "The way I see it is we 
all dead." As two things that look like detonators shoot into his hands he 
runs his finger over the button. A blast in the center of the ship would hit 
the engine room and we all have a one way trip out of here." Looks at DarkOne 
"So I suggest we settle this in the old style one on one combat I'll 
Represent the maximals and you can use your gestalt any natural attacks and 
one weapon of choice. I win we walk away free all 3 of the maximals you win I 
surrender with hurt pride and you have 3 Hostages. You game or well we all 
head to the matrix here now." Tigerhawk keeps his finger on the button.
